Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner.Maze
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Maze extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
This class is used to define a maze for the designer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(MazeProperties mazeProperties)
      This constructor is used to create a maze designer with the given properties.
      See Also:
      • LevelProperties

    • Maze

      public Maze(MazeProperties mazeProperties, ArrayList<Block> blocks)
      This constructor is used to create a maze designer with the given properties and blocks. It can be used to load a maze.
      Parameters:
      blocks - The blocks of the maze.
      See Also:
      • LevelProperties
      • Block

  • Method Details

    • addBlock

      public void addBlock(Block block) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to add a block to the maze. It will check if the block is in the maze and fire a property change.
      Parameters:
      block - The block to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the block is out of bounds.
      See Also:
      • Block
      • PropertyChangeListener

    • removeBlock

      public void removeBlock(Block block)
      Remove a block from the maze. It will fire a property change to update the view.
      Parameters:
      block - The block to remove.
      See Also:
      • Block
      • PropertyChangeListener

    • removeBlocks

      public void removeBlocks(ArrayList<Block> blocks)
      Remove a list of blocks from the maze. It will fire a property change to update the view.
      Parameters:
      blocks - The array list of blocks to remove. It will remove all the blocks in the list.
      See Also:
      • Block
      • ArrayList
      • PropertyChangeListener

    • getBlocks

      public ArrayList<Block> getBlocks()
      Get all blocks stored in the maze. It will sort the blocks by layer.
      Returns:
      The array list of blocks.

    • getBlock

      public Block getBlock(Coordinate coordinate)
      Get a block at the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate of the block.
      Returns:
      The block at the given coordinate or null if there is no block at the given coordinate.
      See Also:
      • Coordinate

    • addListener

      public void addListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Add a property change listener to the maze designer.
      Parameters:
      listener - The property change listener to add.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeListener

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Remove a property change listener from the maze designer.
      Parameters:
      listener - The property change listener to remove.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeListener

    • getProperties

      public MazeProperties getProperties()

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Call when a property is changed. It will be called when the maze properties are changed.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeEvent
      • PropertyChangeListener
      • LevelProperties
